events.name: Cub Scout Adventure Camp
events.description: A weekend camp filled with outdoor activities, games, and campfire stories.

events.name: Nature Exploration Day
events.description: A day dedicated to exploring the local flora and fauna, with guided nature walks and educational sessions.

events.name: Cub Scout Derby Race
events.description: An exciting race event where cub scouts can build and race their own derby cars, with prizes for the fastest and most creative designs.
